ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Incandescent Mask
ygData.msgSnippet: If that don t work, use the charm trick.  What? Don t know that one? hehe If you charm a mob, they will like you or ANY of your friends, and let you compelte
ygData.messageBody:
If that don't work, use the charm trick. What? Don't
know that one? hehe

If you charm a mob, they will like you or ANY of your
friends, and let you compelte quests. Just be
careful! make sure to have gate memmed too =)

--- Mindseye <mindseye@...> wrote:
> Hi...
> Cast invis on yourself and hand her the 50 gold,
> invis won't come off if you just hand it to her and
> she will see you as indifferent. Worked for everyone
> I know =)
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Garett
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 2:52 PM
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Incandescent Mask
>
>
> From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
>
>
> Last night I went to Quenos to try and purchase a
> rune from Madam Serena. Apparently, she had heard
> of me from SOMEONE (I'm not naming names) and
> refused to speak with me, simply took my money. Not
> a single illusion would change her mind, nor would
> any of my 'you like me' spells. In an act of
> desperation I attempted to charm her with my magical
> spells, but apparently she is UNcharmable (I used a
> full mana dump trying). For those not knowing why I
> did this... pets always consider amicable, and a
> charmed NPC is always happy to trade with me.
> Unfortunately, Leutenant something-or-rather saw
> what I was trying to do (after I had meditated back
> to full and was trying to charm her again) and hit
> me, VERY hard. So now not only do I have to find
> some way to make Madam Serena like me but I have a
> grudge with that hard hitting guy. Do I have to go
> spend a week in BlackBurrow killing wimpy gnolls or
> is there some other faster way to make Madam Serena
> interested in dealing with me?
>
> Cogg
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
>
>
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
>

Spirit of the Moon
Enchanter, Jeweler, Short guy
